row.process:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
! Normalize Path :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_GIT_WORKING_DIRECTORY"
! Header Parameter Validation :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository Name" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_GIT_REPO# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Working copy Directory" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_GIT_WORKING_DIRECTORY# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File to be Removed" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_GIT_FILENAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Retain Working Tree Files" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_GIT_CACHE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Additional Options" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_GIT_OPTIONS#
! Verify Working copy Directory errors=0 :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_GIT_WORKING_DIRECTORY# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Working copy Directory" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Working copy Directory '&UC4RB_GIT_WORKING_DIRECTORY#' doesn't exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=1 fi if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "1" ] ; then :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Working copy Directory" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Working copy Directory '&UC4RB_GIT_WORKING_DIRECTORY#' is a file" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=1 fi
! Verify Repository :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_GIT_WORKING_DIRECTORY#/&UC4RB_GIT_REPO#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Repository '&UC4RB_GIT_REPO#' doesn't exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=1 fi if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "1" ] ; then :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Repository '&UC4RB_GIT_REPO#' is a file" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=1 fi ! stop execution if validation errors occurred if [ $errors -gt 0 ] ; then exit $errors; fi
! Start execution :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Remove files from the working tree and from the index :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_GIT.PRV.INCLUDE.COMMAND :SET &UC4RB_GIT_CMD# = "&UC4RB_GIT_CMD# rm"
! Add command options if specified :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_GIT.PRV.INCLUDE.OPTIONS
! Retain working tree copy : IF &UC4RB_GIT_CACHE# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_GIT_CMD# = "&UC4RB_GIT_CMD# --cached " : ENDIF
cd "&UC4RB_GIT_WORKING_DIRECTORY#" cd "&UC4RB_GIT_REPO#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
&UC4RB_GIT_CMD# "&UC4RB_GIT_FILENAME#" 2>/dev/null ! Status message :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GIT REMOVE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GIT REMOVE ACTION FAILED ********" :SET &TEMP# = "Error may occurs because invalid username or password, or repository not found" !------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_GIT.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
